articles.author: Asif Iqbal Shaik
articles.title: Breaking: Exynos 2600 goes official as world's first 2nm smartphone chip - SamMobile
articles.description: Samsung has announced the Exynos 2600 chip. It is not only the company's but the world's first 2nm mobile chip, made using Samsung Foundry's 2nm GAA process. With its innovative heat transfer technology, Samsung is promising much better sustained performance …
